name: aos-soulbound-foundryvtt
description: The **official** system for playing Age of Sigmar: Soulbound on [Foundry VTT](https://foundryvtt.com/). Developed by Moo Man.

scripts.build: node scriptPacker.js&& cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup --config rollup.config.js --watch
scripts.release: node scriptPacker.js&& cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config rollup.config.js
